sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { SafeAreaView, StatusBar, StyleSheet, Button, TextInput, Text, Pressable, View, Image, ScrollView, FlatList } from 'react-native'; import { Dimensions } from 'react-native'; import Ripple from 'react-native-material-ripple'; const Accueil = ({ navigation }) => { const B = (props) => {props.children} return ( navigation.navigate('Menu')} style={{alignItems: 'flex-end', marginRight: 20}}> Mes planifications Aucune course planifi√©e navigation.navigate("Recherche")}> Planifier ); }; export default Accueil;
